        public TaxResponses getBatchTaxByAddress(java.lang.String taxRateTypeId,
                                         TaxAddressRequest body)
                                  throws ApiException
        Post Tax By Address This is a Batch offering for 'Tax By Address' service. It accepts a single address, purchase amount or a list of addresses, purchase amounts and retrieve applicable taxes.
        Parameters:
        taxRateTypeId - The tax rate id. (required)
        body - TaxAddressRequest Class Object having tax request. (required)
        Returns:
        TaxResponses
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • getIPDTaxByAddress

        public TaxDistrictResponse getIPDTaxByAddress(java.lang.String address,
                                              java.lang.String returnLatLongFields,
                                              java.lang.String latLongFormat)
                                       throws ApiException
        Get IPD Tax by Address This will accept 'address' as a parameter and will return one or many IPDs details for that region in which address will fall.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to be searched. (required)
        returnLatLongFields - Y or N (default is N) - Returns Latitude Longitude Fields (optional)
        latLongFormat - (default is Decimal) - Returns Desired Latitude Longitude Format (optional)
        Returns:
        TaxDistrictResponse
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

        latitude - Latitude of the location. (required)
        longitude - Longitude of the location. (required)
        Returns:
        TaxRateResponse
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body
